languages.text: "У меня сохранились кое-какие связи в Астра Милитарум... несколько полков Имперской гвардии позволили бы сладить и с аборигенами, и с "подземными духами", и с магмой — укрепстроения меня никогда не подводили".

traits.locale_text: "У меня сохранились кое-какие связи в Астра Милитарум... несколько полков Имперской гвардии позволили бы сладить и с аборигенами, и с "лесными духами", и с магмой — укрепстроения меня никогда не подводили".

languages.text: "I have retained some connections in the Astra Militarum... A few Imperial Guard regiments would take care of the natives, their 'spirits,' and the magma — solid fortifications have never let me down."
languages.original_text: "У меня сохранились кое-какие связи в Астра Милитарум... несколько полков Имперской гвардии позволили бы сладить и с аборигенами, и с "подземными духами", и с магмой — укрепстроения меня никогда не подводили".

traits.locale_text: "I have retained some connections in the Astra Militarum... A few Imperial Guard regiments would take care of the natives, their 'spirits,' and the magma — solid fortifications have never let me down."

"I have retained some connections in the Astra Militarum... A few Imperial Guard regiments would take care of the natives, their 'spirits,' and the magma — solid fortifications have never let me down."

"I have retained some connections in the Astra Militarum... A few Imperial Guard regiments would take care of the natives, their 'spirits,' and the magma — solid fortifications have never let me down."

"I have retained some connections in the Astra Militarum... A few Imperial Guard regiments would take care of the natives, their 'spirits,' and the magma — solid fortifications have never let me down."

"I have retained some connections in the Astra Militarum... A few Imperial Guard regiments would take care of the natives, their 'spirits,' and the magma — solid fortifications have never let me down."

languages.text: “我在星界军里有一群熟人……他们会派来几支帝国卫队，解决掉那些当地人，消灭他们的‘冥界之灵’，处理掉那些岩浆。帝国坚固的防御工事还从来没让我失望过。”
languages.original_text: "I have retained some connections in the Astra Militarum... A few Imperial Guard regiments would take care of the natives, their 'spirits,' and the magma — solid fortifications have never let me down."

traits.locale_text: “我在星界军里有一群熟人……他们会派来几支帝国卫队，解决掉那些当地人，消灭他们的‘冥界之灵’，处理掉那些岩浆。帝国坚固的防御工事还从来没让我失望过。”

languages.text: «Conservo contactos en el Astra Militarum... Unos cuantos regimientos de Guardia Imperial bastarían para ocuparse de los nativos, sus "espíritus" y el magma. Hasta ahora no me han fallado las fortificaciones».
languages.original_text: "I have retained some connections in the Astra Militarum... A few Imperial Guard regiments would take care of the natives, their 'spirits,' and the magma — solid fortifications have never let me down."

traits.locale_text: «Conservo contactos en el Astra Militarum... Unos cuantos regimientos de Guardia Imperial bastarían para ocuparse de los nativos, sus "espíritus" y el magma. Hasta ahora no me han fallado las fortificaciones».

languages.text: 「私は帝国防衛軍とのつながりをまだ保っています…少数の帝国防衛軍の連隊で先住民、彼らのスピリット、そしてマグマに対処できるでしょう。堅固な要塞が私を裏切ったことはありません」
languages.original_text: "I have retained some connections in the Astra Militarum... A few Imperial Guard regiments would take care of the natives, their 'spirits,' and the magma — solid fortifications have never let me down."

traits.locale_text: 「私は帝国防衛軍とのつながりをまだ保っています…少数の帝国防衛軍の連隊で先住民、彼らのスピリット、そしてマグマに対処できるでしょう。堅固な要塞が私をがっかりさせたことはありません」
「私は帝国防衛軍とのつながりをまだ保っています…少数の帝国防衛軍の連隊で先住民、彼らのスピリット、そしてマグマに対処できるでしょう。堅固な要塞が私を裏切ったことはありません」

languages.text: « J'entretiens encore des relations au sein de l'Astra Militarum... Quelques régiments de la Garde Impériale pourraient s'occuper des indigènes, de leurs "esprits" et du magma... Rien de tel que de solides fortifications. »
languages.original_text: "I have retained some connections in the Astra Militarum... A few Imperial Guard regiments would take care of the natives, their 'spirits,' and the magma — solid fortifications have never let me down."

traits.locale_text: « J'entretiens encore des relations au sein de l'Astra Militarum... Quelques régiments de la Garde Impériale pourraient s'occuper des indigènes, de leurs "esprits" et du magma... Rien de tel que de solides fortifications. »

languages.text: "Ich habe mir einige Verbindungen zum Astra Militarum bewahrt ... Einige Regimenter der imperialen Armee könnten sich um die Einheimischen, ihre 'Geister' und das Magma kümmern – stabile Befestigungen haben mich noch nie enttäuscht."
languages.original_text: "I have retained some connections in the Astra Militarum... A few Imperial Guard regiments would take care of the natives, their 'spirits,' and the magma — solid fortifications have never let me down."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe mir einige Verbindungen zum Astra Militarum bewahrt ... Einige Regimenter der imperialen Armee könnten sich um die Einheimischen, ihre 'Geister' und das Magma kümmern – stabile Befestigungen haben mich noch nie enttäuscht."

languages.text: "Astra Militarum'da hâlâ birkaç bağlantım mevcut. Birkaç İmparatorluk Muhafız alayı yerlilerin, tapındıkları o 'ruhların' ve magmanın icabına bakacaktır. Sağlam bir tahkimat beni asla yüzüstü bırakmadı."
languages.original_text: "I have retained some connections in the Astra Militarum... A few Imperial Guard regiments would take care of the natives, their 'spirits,' and the magma — solid fortifications have never let me down."

traits.locale_text: "Astra Militarum'da hâlâ birkaç bağlantım mevcut. Birkaç İmparatorluk Muhafız alayı yerlilerin, tapındıkları o 'ruhların' ve magmanın icabına bakacaktır. Sağlam bir tahkimat beni asla yüzüstü bırakmadı."
